title: Firepower 1423-0086 Heavy Duty Cone and Chisel Chipping Hammer

description: Thermady, cone and chisel, chipping hammer (12", 14 oz.). Hammer heads are hardened to precisely controlled temperatures for durability and strength. Wide-blade design removes slag faster and adds to life of the tool. Accessory tool item.
